solution_line_template: He family eats {total_donuts} donuts because {num_dozens} x {donuts_per_dozen} = <<{num_dozens}*{donuts_per_dozen}={total_donuts}>>{total_donuts}
They need {total_ounces_needed} ounces of coffee for these because {ounces_per_donut} x {total_donuts} = <<{ounces_per_donut}*{total_donuts}={total_ounces_needed}>>{total_ounces_needed}
This is equal to {num_pots} pots of coffee because {total_ounces_needed} / {ounces_per_pot} = <<{total_ounces_needed}/{ounces_per_pot}={num_pots}>>{num_pots}
This will cost ${total_cost} to make because {num_pots} x {cost_per_pot} = <<{num_pots}*{cost_per_pot}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
